entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:42 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:42 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:42 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
